countries.name: Azerbaijan
countries.description: Azerbaijan is a country located at the boundary of Eastern Europe and Western Asia, known for its rich culture and oil resources.

countries.name: Turkey
countries.description: Turkey bridges Europe and Asia, famous for its historical landmarks like Hagia Sophia and delicious cuisine.

countries.name: Germany
countries.description: Germany is a leading country in Europe, known for its engineering, cultural heritage, and modern economy.

countries.name: France
countries.description: France is a country known for its history, art, and culture, including landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and its world-class wine.

countries.name: Italy
countries.description: Italy is famous for its art, architecture, and cuisine, including landmarks like the Colosseum and Venice.

countries.name: United States
countries.description: The United States is a global superpower known for its diverse culture, technology, and political influence.

countries.name: Canada
countries.description: Canada is a large North American country known for its natural beauty, multiculturalism, and high standard of living.
